# Speke

> Speke is a communication layer for modern remote teams, combining structured team messaging with instant voice collaboration.

## Product Positioning
- Built for teams already using modern tools (including Microsoft Teams) that still need faster alignment.
- Connects async knowledge sharing and live voice without losing context.
- Prioritizes organization-level privacy, searchable history, and role-aware access.

## Core Capabilities
- Structured channels for persistent project knowledge.
- Instant voice rooms for quick blocker resolution.
- Presence and speaking indicators for live coordination.
- Private organization workspaces with controlled member access.

## Primary Audience
- Product, operations, and leadership teams working across locations and time zones.
- Remote and hybrid organizations that need tighter daily communication loops.
- Teams that want clearer communication flow on top of their existing collaboration stack.

## Canonical URLs
- Website: https://virtual-office-dev.janhoon.com/
- Live Application: https://virtual-office-dev.janhoon.com/
- Source Repository: Private
